      • getAllCertificates

        @GetMapping(produces="application/json")
public java.util.List<com.epam.esm.service.dto.GiftCertificateDto> getAllCertificates(@RequestParam(value="query",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String query,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="tag",defaultValue="")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String tag,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="sortBy",defaultValue="date")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String sortBy,
                                                                                                                                @RequestParam(value="sortOrder",defaultValue="asc")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String sortOrder)
                                                                                                                         throws com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException
        get filtered and sorted list of GiftCertificateDto
        Parameters:
        query - search certificates by part of name or description
        tag - search certificates by one tag name associated with them
        sortBy - specifies how certificates will be sorted (date - by last update date, name - by name)
        sortOrder - specifies sort order (asc - ascending, desc - descending)
        Returns:
        list of GiftCertificateDto
        Throws:
        com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException - if an error occurs

      • deleteCertificate

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> deleteCertificate(@PathVariable
                                                                                                          int id)
                                                                                                   throws com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException,
                                                                                                          com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.NoSuchElementException
        delete certificate with specified id
        Parameters:
        id - certificate id
        Returns:
        deleted certificate id, if successful
        Throws:
        com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.ServiceException - if an error occurs
        com.epam.esm.service.exception.impl.NoSuchElementException - if there's no such certificate with specified id

        Throws:
